docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: GET /
docs.text: Description: Returns a welcome message. - URL: / - Method: GET - Response: - Status: 200 OK - Body: json { "message": "Main Handler" }

docs.title: GET /users
docs.text: Description: Retrieves a list of all users. - URL: /users - Method: GET - Response: - Status: 200 OK - Body: json [ { "id": 1, "username": "user1", "email": "user1@example.com" }, ... ]

docs.title: POST /users
docs.text: Description: Creates a new user. - URL: /users - Method: POST - Request Body: ```json { "username": "user1", "email": "user1@example.com" }
